meanings.definition: A term used to refer to a young man or boy.
meanings.sent1: The boi played with his toy car.
meanings.sent2: I saw a boi riding his bike in the park.
meanings.sent3: The little boi giggled as he chased after the puppy.
meanings.sent4: He may be a grown man now, but he will always be my little boi.
meanings.sent5: The boi's laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: A term used to express excitement or approval.
meanings.sent1: Wow, that movie was so good, boi!
meanings.sent2: Boi, I can't believe we won the game!
meanings.sent3: Boi, that ice cream was the best I've ever had!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky, and everyone shouted 'boi' in amazement.
meanings.sent5: The surprise party was a huge success, and everyone shouted 'boi' with joy.

meanings.definition: A term used to describe someone who is masculine in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: He's a real tough boi, always ready to help out.
meanings.sent2: The boi lifted the heavy boxes with ease.
meanings.sent3: The boi strutted confidently down the street, turning heads.
meanings.sent4: In the gym, he's known as the boi with the strongest muscles.
meanings.sent5: His deep voice and strong build made him stand out as a true boi.
